specifications.Dye Method: Piece Dye - Dye Method > PFD / BO The fabric which is prepared for dyeing or print.
specifications.Care Advice: Woven > Satin Weave > Satin This fabric is easily damaged by rubbing or scratching, so please handle it with care.
specifications.Care Instructions: Hand wash only Wash separately Turn inside out before washing, Do not wring Do not bleach Line dry Iron on low heat on reverse side if needed Recommended Use Dresses, Pajamas, Bridal
